"Xiera": "OK, that was your third Normal Attack!"
"By learning skills, you will unlock <red>your fourth and fifth Normal Attacks<c>!"

"By selecting \"Learn Skills\" under \"Dark Blast\" on the Main Menu, you can upgrade your Dark Blast skills and master new skills.

To strengthen and learn skills, you need \"EXP\" dedicated to Dark Blasts. During quests, EXP will accumulate from defeating enemies. You obtain the accumulated EXP on clearing the quest. (Accumulated EXP is shared across your account.)

Some skills have release conditions."

"In Elder Form, by selecting \"Dark Blast\" from the main menu and learning the skills Normal Attack Combo Plus 1 and 2, you can add a fourth and fifth stage to your Normal Attacks.

The fourth and fifth Normal Attacks take a long time to execute, but their power is very high."
